scripts.deploy-all: concurrently "npm run deployf" "npm run deployb" "npm run heroku-logs"
scripts.deployb: cd server; godep save ./... ; git add . ; git commit -m "Deploy" ; git push heroku master ; cd ..
scripts.deployf: cd client ; yarn build ; firebase deploy && open $npm_package_config_hosted
scripts.functions: cd serverless/functions/ ; firebase deploy --only functions; cd ..
scripts.heroku-be-refresh: cd server; heroku apps:destroy --app $npm_package_config_servername --confirm $npm_package_config_servername ; git init ; git add . ; heroku create $npm_package_config_servername; cd .. ; npm run deployb
